entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
